name: Arcada University of Applied Sciences
membership: The Rectors’ Conference of Finnish Universities of Applied Sciences – Arene
goal:
Arcada is a multi-professional university of applied sciences (UAS). It is a hub for research-based innovation where solutions for a sustainable society are co-created. We remain at the forefront within both teaching and research by working in close cooperation with the business community and public sector. A strong link between our research and teaching guarantees that our graduates are well equipped for the future demands of the labour market. As a result, Arcada ranks number one for two consecutive years in the annual comparison of UAS in Finland.

Arcada has for more than 20 years offered higher and further education training in Swedish, English and Finnish. Today some 2700 students are enrolled in our bachelor’s and master’s degree programmes. On our modern campus in Helsinki, Finland, we host state of the art simulation labs, a music, TV and photo studio and a sports testing lab. Our departments reflect our core fields of expertise:

• Business Management and Analytics,
• Energy and Materials Technology,
• Health and Welfare, Healthcare, and
• Culture and Communication.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation, Sport, Trade, Youth
